problem.markdown:
1. The duty cycle of an astable multivibrator will vary between ----- % and ------% () 0 , 50 () 0 , 100 (x) 50 , 100 () None of above
2) In a typical IC monostable multivibrator circuit, at the falling edge of the trigger input, the output switches HIGH for a period of time determined by the ________. (x) value of the RC timing components () amplitude of the input trigger () frequency of the input trigger () magnitude of the dc supply voltage
3) Main application of monostable multivibrator is to generate () Sign output (x) Pulsed output () Square output () Sawtooth output
4) For the timer operation IC should be operated in ----- mode (x) Monostable () Astable () Bistable () a and b
5) The trigger input (pin 2) of IC 555 is connected to ------- when it is operated as an oscillator () Vcc () GND () External trigger pulse (x) Pin6
